azurerm_servicebus_topic_authorization_r.description: Manages a ServiceBus Topic authorization Rule within a ServiceBus Topic.

name.description: Specifies the name of the ServiceBus Topic Authorization Rule resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

namespace_name.description: Specifies the name of the ServiceBus Namespace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

topic_name.description: Specifies the name of the ServiceBus Topic. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the ServiceBus Namespace exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

listen.description: Grants listen access to this this Authorization Rule. Defaults to `false`.

send.description: Grants send access to this this Authorization Rule. Defaults to `false`.

manage.description: Grants manage access to this this Authorization Rule. When this property is `true` - both `listen` and `send` must be too. Defaults to `false`.

primary_key.description: The Primary Key for the ServiceBus Topic authorization Rule.

primary_connection_string.description: The Primary Connection String for the ServiceBus Topic authorization Rule.

secondary_key.description: The Secondary Key for the ServiceBus Topic authorization Rule.

secondary_connection_string.description: The Secondary Connection String for the ServiceBus Topic authorization Rule.

create.description: Used when creating the ServiceBus Topic Authorization Rule.

update.description: Used when updating the ServiceBus Topic Authorization Rule.

read.description: Used when retrieving the ServiceBus Topic Authorization Rule.

delete.description: Used when deleting the ServiceBus Topic Authorization Rule.
